style.name: anidbstyle
style.title: AniDBstyle
style.creator: akujin
style.description: Generally aims to emulate the old table layout as closely as possible, but with much looser underlying markup. Converted to css by Rar,PetriW and epoximator.

style.name: anidbstyle_hacks
style.title: AniDBstyle Hacks
style.creator: Amour
style.description: hacks for the default css (IE7 compatibility)

style.name: anidbstyle-dongato
style.title: AniDB Style DonGato's revision
style.creator: DonGato
style.description: it only works well with Firefox (sorry don't have any more time to spend with IE/Opera)

style.name: dark-style
style.title: Dark Style
style.creator: sylwira
style.description: Firefox only. (Works also in Opera, but not so well. Don't even try it with IE :D )

style.name: fma_style
style.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Style
style.creator: jkaze
style.description: Viewing some Fullmetal Alchemist characters in the top, with simple design!

style.name: grey
style.title: Grey
style.creator: zeromind
style.description: It's mainly grey and uses images (some with transparency) for texturising the backgrounds and Arial Unicode MS/Arial for text.

style.name: haruhistylex
style.title: HaruhiStyleX.AniDB
style.creator: TheJAG
style.status: not maintained anymore and replaced by v2
style.description: NOTE! This style contains adult content. HaruhiStyleX.AniDB is developed for Opera at a resolution of 1280x1024 and may not work in any other webbrowser or lower resolutions. (Based on Harustyle by b1hn.)

style.name: haruhistylex-v2
style.title: HaruhiStyleX.AniDB v2
style.creator: TheJAG
style.description: This style features pornographic images commonly known as hentai images of the popular character Haruhi from the Suzumiya Haruhi no Yuuutsu anime series. HaruhiStyleX.AniDB v2 is designed for a screen resolutions of 1024x768 and higher! Currently this stylesheet is compatible with the Opera 9+ browser, Safari 3+ and Firefox 2+ are partially compatible due to their lack of CSS support

style.name: harustyle
style.title: Harustyle
style.creator: b1nh
style.description: Completely recoded based on epox' gray css. Everything should work now.

style.name: luckystyle
style.title: LuckyStyle
style.creator: Breadstone
style.description: Thanks to B1nhs help i've finally completed my LuckyStyle. I hope you guys (and gals) like it. If you find any bugs or something you think should be fixed just send me a PM.

style.name: nice-day
style.title: Nice Day
style.creator: epoximator
style.description: Based on "Beautiful Day" by Kaushal Sheth (http://www.kaushalsheth.com)

style.name: simplestyle
style.title: SimpleStyle
style.creator: b1nh (AniDB: binhkun)
style.description: This is my newest AniDB CSS style "SimpleStyle". Internet Explorer not supported due to a css bug. Well, what should I say ... I kept it simple and clean. If it's too bright for you, turn down your screen brightness, use sunglasses or wait for a dark version ;) Thanks to zak, Rar and pelican for the css help. In case you've wondered where the profile link is - it's the big P on the top right ;)

style.name: zakura-menu
style.title: sub-zakura-menu
style.creator: fahrenheit
style.description: Based on Zakura by Zak and Nice-day by Epoximator
